snippet.title: Digimon Nova Red - COMPLETED Fire Red Rom Hack with Digimon!
snippet.description:
What's up guys, this is a rom hack I made of Fire Red but all the Pokemon are replaced with Digimon.

FEATURES

-250 Digimon with unique stats, abilities, Typing, and movepools built from the ground-up!
-Favourable encounter rates and locations so all 250 mons are obtainable
-Every single Digimon is viable. No Digimon is "filler."
-Five evolutionary stages for prominent Digimon
-Unique attacks from the Digimon canon (Pepper Breath, etc.)
-Branching evolutionary paths via level-up or "DigiEggs" (basically evolutionary stones)
-Gen IV Abilities and Moves
-Fairy Type
-Physical-Special Split
-Poison Survival
-BW Repel System
-Reusable TMs
-Forgettable HM moves
-Ice buff (Ice now resists Grass and Ground)


Download link:
https://www.pokecommunity.com/showthread.php?t=455680
